Sentence.string: I prefer to be called Robert if you don’t mind.
Ok Robert. So you are Marcus Blayton’s son, aren’t you ?
Biological son, yes… - he gives a sigh. Who are you ?
Detective Percy White. I’m investigating on the death of your father. My condolences.
I don’t want to be impolite Mr. White but you can keep your condolences. I don’t really like to speak about him, even less after what happened to him.
